statements: SELECT * FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data, timestamp FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, data FROM DataProcessingTable ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE data LIKE 'test%';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DataProcessingTable;
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, data FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE LENGTH(data) > 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM DataProcessingTable WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM users LEFT JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING order_count > 2;
SELECT user_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN users ON orders.user_id = users.user_id WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT u.username, o.order_date, p.product_name, p.price FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id WHERE u.username = 'John' AND p.price < 50 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) FROM orders;
SELECT record_id, record_data FROM data_records;
SELECT * FROM data_aggregates WHERE aggregate_value > 100;
SELECT aggregate_name, aggregate_value FROM data_aggregates ORDER BY aggregate_value DESC;
SELECT index_id FROM data_indices WHERE index_value = 50;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM data_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT record_id, record_data FROM data_records WHERE record_data LIKE '%example%'
SELECT aggregate_name, SUM(aggregate_value) AS total_value FROM data_aggregates GROUP BY aggregate_name
SELECT * FROM data_indices WHERE index_value BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY index_value
SELECT log_id, log_message, DATE(log_timestamp) AS log_date FROM data_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold < 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role='customer' AND username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
